# Areal leilighet



```{r}
bod <- (1.64*1.4) + (0.4*0.5)
soverom <- 3.75*3.15
stue <- (3.75*1.75) + (0.75*0.25)
gang <- (3.3*1.75) + (0.85*0.25)
kjøkken <- 5.53*2.3
vindfang <- (1.2*1.1) + (0.2*0.8)
```


```{r}
sum(bod)
sum(soverom)
sum(stue)
sum(gang)
sum(kjøkken)
sum(vindfang)
sum(bod,gang,kjøkken,soverom,stue,vindfang)
```
